servinfo.title: DTC P1431: Clogged Diesel Particulate Filter Failures

attention2.ptxt: If diesel particulate filter is replaced, be sure to initialize diesel particulate filter data in ECM.
For details, refer to Diesel Particulate Filter Data Initialization:For Diesel Engine Model .

item.ptxt: Conditions for applying fault finding procedures to stored faults:
The fault is declared present after the engine is started or following a road test.
Diesel particulate filter regenerations are inhibited.
The Injection warning light (gravity 1 warning light) is lit.

entry.ptxt: Check the condition of the following pressure pipes:

item.ptxt: Differential pressure sensor downstream side pipe if necessary.

entry.ptxt: The fault appears if the weight of soot contained in the filter is greater than 50 g.
Carry out diesel particulate filter after-sales regeneration referring to Diesel Particulate Filter After-sales Regeneration Procedure:For Diesel Engine Model .
If the fault is still present, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
